org.axiondb.types
Class LOBType

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.axiondb.types.BaseDataType
        |
        +--org.axiondb.types.LOBType
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataType, DataTypeFactory, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompressedLOBType
public class LOBType
extends BaseDataType

A DataType representing a Large Object (LOB), for example a Clob or Blob.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $ $Date: 2003/05/14 19:07:30 $
See Also:
